EN:

The â€œRight-to-Left Language Support in ChatGPTâ€ extension for Chrome is designed to fix text layout issues for Persian, Arabic, and other right-to-left languages in ChatGPT.

Ever tried writing in Persian, Arabic, or other right-to-left languages in ChatGPT, only to see the text misaligned? This extension fixes everything and displays the text properly and neatly.

Key features:
	â€¢	Right-to-Left Text Alignment: Displays text in the right direction with proper alignment.
	â€¢	Improved Readability: Adjusts layout for easier reading.
	â€¢	Formatted Lists: Neatly arranges list items for better readability.

Plus, there are no watermarks, logos, or ads showing up on the page; everything is designed to be simple and practical for the best experience with the extension.
